title: Chat 2.0
content: A simple, mobile friendly, chat app using Google's Firebase as a backend.

title: Markdown Editor
content: A side-by-side markdown editor (not mobile friendly)

title: Notes (C-Bin)
content: C-Bin is a proof of concept. It take your note, encodes it with base64, appends it to the url hash and finally generate a unique short Url for sharing.

title: Imgur Upload
content: Quickly upload an image to Imgur.

title: Laverna
content: A hosted instance of Laverna, a markdown note taking app focused on privacy.

title: Submit An App
content: If you have an app idea or would like to see a hosted instance of a pre-existing app click below.
